item.title: Apple Still Investigating Cellular MacBook as Microsoft Ships Surface 5G
item.description: Recent reports have suggested Apple is actively considering bringing cellular connectivity to the Mac lineup as early as next year, but arch rival Microsoft isn’t waiting around to find out – the comp
